arts.ttl: Leader Barcelona loses to Leganes as Atletico Madrid moves level on points at top of Spanish league
arts.sum: Playing in the first of five La Liga matches on Sunday, Atletico won its sixth consecutive league game to move a point clear of Real, which could only draw 3-3 with Real Vallecano on Saturday. Barcelona stayed top of the Spanish league despite a shock 1-0 home defeat on Sunday to lowly Leganes, a team that had not won away all season.

arts.ttl: European football: Atlético Madrid beat Getafe while Dortmund draw at home
arts.sum: Sørloth moves Atlético above Real Madrid into second Hoffenheim snatch 1-1 draw with Bruun Larsen’s leveller Alexander Sørloth came off the bench to score with a header late in the second half and give Atlético Madrid a hard-fought 1-0 win over Getafe in La Liga, their 11th consecutive triumph in all competitions. Atlético went level with Barcelona at the top of the standings before the leaders’ home game against Leganés on Sunday night on 38 points, moving above Real Madrid who are third on 37. arts.ttl: Exclusive: Atletico Madrid 25-26 Third Kit Info Leaked
arts.sum: Footy Headlines can reveal the first details about Atlético Madrid's new 2025-26 third kit.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid Level Atop La Liga With Barcelona After Getafe Win
arts.sum: Atletico got their 11th straight win in all competitions on Sunday ahead of their showdown with Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone praises substitutes after “best result” in 1-0 win over Getafe
arts.sum: We have repeated the formation several times and there are players who are competing in an extraordinary way, showing what they can do when it’s their turn to come on. Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the media following the team’s 1-0 win over Getafe in La Liga on Sunday afternoon as he praised the squad and the result.

arts.ttl: ‘I really, really like them’ – Diego Simeone hails Hansi Flick’s Barcelona
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone has on Saturday moved to reveal his appreciation for the project put in place by Hansi Flick at Barcelona. Despite a recent hiccup on…

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone demands more from Atlético Madrid captain Koke: “I always expect more”
arts.sum: “Now it’s his turn not to start but to play in many games and he has done it the way he does, we need his hierarchy, his place in the dressing room as our captain and to continue in the form he is in,” he added. “If there is someone who knows me like no one else in this squad, it is Koke, he knows what we are looking for, the importance of the group to help the team,” the coach explained in his press conference.

arts.ttl: Midfielder reveals Paris Saint-Germain blocked summer transfer to Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: During the summer, Atletico Madrid tried to sign another midfielder alongside Conor Gallagher, who joined from Chelsea. The idea was that they wanted to sell off Thomas Lemar and pick up a replacement, although as it turned out, it did not happen. One player that Atleti tried to sign was Danilo Pereira, and the player […] The post Midfielder reveals Paris Saint-Germain blocked summer transfer to Atletico Madrid appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Atlético clarify Rodrigo Riquelme’s future amid his poor start to 2024/25
arts.sum: His first season in the Atlético first team was solid: he started 17 of his 34 appearances in LaLiga, with a return of 3 goals and 5 assists across 1,528 minutes, often while playing as a left wing-back. A new report in Marca states that Atlético Madrid are not contemplating the loan or sale of Rodrigo Riquelme, despite the player’s struggle for minutes and his poor form — which has prompted unfortunate abuse on social media.

arts.ttl: Sources: Tottenham's stance on Omar Alderete explained as Wolves offered £13m La Liga ace
